Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory66.jpg'}
{3: 'Just when the Musashi unit is about to catch you, you see a blade flashing past, slashing the Musashi in half.'}
{3: 'The one who protected you was the Corrupted that had to run away from you, right at the beginning of this whole drama.'}
{3: "You see a familiar expression in the Corrupted's eyes, strong, unwavering, and reminding you of someone."}
{1: '698', 2: 'The Corrupted from before...', 3: '11', 4: 'Lucia?', 5: '12'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Corrupted?', 3: "Looks like you're still seeing me as a Corrupted, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Corrupted?', 3: 'Commandant, I am ■■, here awaiting your command.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Shouldn't you have run away, Lucia? Why are you still here?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm only here to help rescue Commandant, just like everyone else.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I'm asking you why you're on your own. You could have met up with other Constructs...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'In that case, I would still be seen as a Corrupted and got attacked, just like before.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Even if the others recognized me, Commandant's perception would still have been compromised and would likely give an order to attack.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...And that will damage our relationship. Isn't that your true purpose?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Not entirely... But if you say so, that means my plan has at least partially worked, don't you think?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Not in the slightest.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Are you kidding? The commandant you are protecting right now was attacking you, a "Corrupted", with no mercy.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'The same commandant who was hesitating during the last question.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Are you sure such a person is worth your protection and trust?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'At first, when Commandant thought I was a Corrupted and could not hear my words...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I never thought that could shock my M.I.N.D. so much.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But there's one thing that I'm always certain.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It doesn't matter what Commandant sees me as, because I only have one thing to do, right from the beginning.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "And that is, to become Commandant's blade.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So, are you going to join the fight now?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Wait a sec... How can you possibly move?', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Because I cut off the control devices to the connection chamber, the ones you planted nearby before I entered the mansion. No need to thank me for my return gift... Happy April Fool's Day, Vera.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: "Bloody Cerberus! You're not going to walk away easily!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Even if Cerberus has privileges, you can't do whatever you want... You will face punishment.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "...Guess I'll have to retreat.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Are you trying to run away?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Yeah, obviously. One member alone can't make a Cerberus.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'The ground is shaking... Is she trying to blow up the mansion?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "That's the end of the April Fool's fun. I will make you pay for this, Gray Raven. And everyone else...", 4: '1'}
